channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Stolen motorbike, 1st September
item.description:
The motorbike has been dumped in bay 5 for almost 2 months. Please clear as it is attracting the criminal element to the area. It has been reported a few times but its still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Setchell Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vandalised Traffic Light Outside Pavilion Leisure Centre, 1st September
item.description:
Traffic light at junction outside Pavilion Leisure Centre is facing wrong way for pedestrians, therefore cannot see whether it is safe to cross or not. Light hanging down from unit too. Vandalised at least a week ago. Kentish Way, BR1 3EF

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Close, Plaistow, London

item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Dead tree in grounds of flats on corner of Copers Cope and Bridge Roads, 1st September
item.description:
This tree has been dead for some time and is now beginning to disintegrate shedding bark and bits of wood onto the pavement. It appears to be unstable and is at risk of falling onto the pavement and highway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bridge Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Itâ€™s blocking my driveway, 31st August
item.description:
